item.title: 'We need solutions': Palestinians in West Bank fear recognition is not enough
item.description: Many are concerned Israel may attempt to annex the occupied territory in response to several countries recognising Palestinian statehood.

item.title: 'We need solutions': Palestinians in West Bank fear recognition is not enough
item.description: Many are concerned Israel may attempt to annex the occupied territory in response to several countries recognising Palestinian statehood.

item.title: British-Egyptian activist reunited with family after release from prison
item.description: Alaa Abdel Fattah, who was imprisoned in Egypt for six years, is reunited with his family in Cairo after being pardoned.

item.title: Secret Service disrupts telecom threat near UN General Assembly
item.description: Investigators say the scheme could have shut down the cellular network in New York City.

item.title: Zayn Malik announces Las Vegas residency for 2026
item.description: The former One Direction singer has only toured solo once since leaving the boyband in 2015.
